spec_data.Name: sugar-fototoon
spec_data.Description:
Fototoon is a sugar activity used to create cartoons using photos
or drawings. After selecting the images, the user can select globes
and write text to tell a story.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Thu 27 Jul 2017 07:11:13 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: An activity used to create cartoons
